nodes.bodyText: Switched to TODO  because FIXME implies we shouldn't release until this is resolved IMO.

nodes.bodyText: Looks like there's some duplication going on here that we may want to cut back on. (Same as line 151)
Yeah, this is related to the tech-debt I was talking about. We definitely need to clean up these classes.
Is there a reason we want this class to use static methods rather than using the @Component annotation and autowire this in where needed and autowire in the BlackDuckProviderKey?
